resources.string: Enable device admin to allow the app to operate reliably and prevent accidental uninstallation. This is required for the app\'s core background functionality.
Standard device admin deactivation. No secret key protection is currently configured for this app.
Deactivation previously authorized. You may now proceed to disable Device Admin.
Deactivation requires authorization. Please open the app, use the \'Authorize Admin Deactivation\' option with your 16-digit secret key to proceed.
